author: Mike Giardi
title: Josh Allen: 'I understand how big of a year it is' - NFL.com
description: Josh Allen: 'I understand how big of a year it is' NFL.com Josh Allen: I understand how big of a year this is NBCSports.com Vikings WR Thielen calls Diggs trade a 'bummer' NFL.com What needs did the Bills leave for the draft? WBEN Stefon Diggs ‘super pumped t…
content:
Josh Allen knows what time it is. Time to take the next step both for his team, the Buffalo Bills, and for himself.
"What we have going on is a special thing," Allen said during a conference call Friday. "I understand how big of a year it is."
